00026 GuiManager::~GuiManager()

00029     winManager = NULL;
00030     delete guiSystem;
00031     delete guiRenderer;
00032     manager = NULL;

00035 void GuiManager::initialize()
00036 {
00037     guiRenderer = new HgeRenderer();
00038     guiSystem = new System(guiRenderer);
00039 
00040     winManager = WindowManager::getSingletonPtr();
00041 
00042     setSchemeFile("..\\resources\\gui\\schemes\\TaharezLookSkin.scheme");
00043     setDefaultCursor("TaharezLook", "MouseArrow");
00044     setConsoleLayoutFile("..\\resources\\gui\\layouts\\console.layout");
00045     setDefaultFont("BlueHighway-12");
00046     setConsoleName("console");
00047 }

00074 void GuiManager::writeToConsole(const string& text)
00075 {
00076     if (guiSystem != NULL && consoleLoaded)
00077     {
00078         Listbox* tmp = static_cast<Listbox*>(getWindow(consoleWindowName));
00079         ListboxTextItem* item = new ListboxTextItem(text);
00080         tmp->addItem(item);
00081     }
00082 }

00094 void GuiManager::loadLayout(const string& layoutFile)
00095 {
00096     clear();
00097     consoleLoaded = true;
00098     rootWindow = winManager->loadWindowLayout(layoutFile);
00099     guiSystem->setGUISheet(rootWindow);
00100     rootWindow->show();
00101     rootWindow->setMouseAutoRepeatEnabled(false);
00102 
00103     consoleWindow = winManager->loadWindowLayout(consoleWindowLayoutFile);
00104     consoleWindow->hide();
00105     rootWindow->addChildWindow(consoleWindow);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void GuiManager::clear()
00109 {
00110     consoleLoaded = false;
00111     winManager->destroyAllWindows();
00112     guiSystem->removeAllEvents();
00113 }

00120 Listbox* GuiManager::getListbox(const string& name)
00121 {
00122     Window* tmp = winManager->getWindow(name);
00123     if (tmp->getType() == "TaharezLook/Listbox")
00124         return static_cast<Listbox*>(tmp);
00125     else
00126     {
00127         writeToConsole(name + " cannot be cast to Listbox.");
00128         return NULL;
00129     }
00130 }

00226 void GuiManager::update()
00227 {
00228     HGE* hge = SystemManager::get()->getHGEManager();
00229     guiSystem->injectChar(hge->Input_GetKey());
00230 
00231     if (hge->Input_GetKey() == HGEK_LEFT && hge->Input_KeyDown(HGEK_LEFT))
00232         guiSystem->injectKeyDown(Key::ArrowLeft);
00233     else if (hge->Input_GetKey() == HGEK_RIGHT && hge->Input_KeyDown(HGEK_RIGHT))
00234         guiSystem->injectKeyDown(Key::ArrowRight);
00235     else if (hge->Input_GetKey() == HGEK_UP && hge->Input_KeyDown(HGEK_UP))
00236         guiSystem->injectKeyDown(Key::ArrowUp);
00237     else if (hge->Input_GetKey() == HGEK_DOWN && hge->Input_KeyDown(HGEK_DOWN))
00238         guiSystem->injectKeyDown(Key::ArrowDown);
00239     else if (hge->Input_GetKey() == HGEK_BACKSPACE && hge->Input_KeyDown(HGEK_BACKSPACE))
00240         guiSystem->injectKeyDown(Key::Backspace);
00241     else if (hge->Input_GetKey() != 0 && hge->Input_KeyDown(hge->Input_GetKey()))
00242         guiSystem->injectKeyDown(hge->Input_GetKey());
00243 
00244 
00245     if (hge->Input_GetKey() == HGEK_LEFT && hge->Input_KeyUp(HGEK_LEFT))
00246         guiSystem->injectKeyUp(Key::ArrowLeft);
00247     else if (hge->Input_GetKey() == HGEK_RIGHT && hge->Input_KeyUp(HGEK_RIGHT))
00248         guiSystem->injectKeyUp(Key::ArrowRight);
00249     else if (hge->Input_GetKey() == HGEK_UP && hge->Input_KeyUp(HGEK_UP))
00250         guiSystem->injectKeyUp(Key::ArrowUp);
00251     else if (hge->Input_GetKey() == HGEK_DOWN && hge->Input_KeyUp(HGEK_DOWN))
00252         guiSystem->injectKeyUp(Key::ArrowDown);
00253     else if (hge->Input_GetKey() == HGEK_BACKSPACE && hge->Input_KeyUp(HGEK_BACKSPACE))
00254         guiSystem->injectKeyUp(Key::Backspace);
00255     else if (hge->Input_GetKey() != 0 && hge->Input_KeyUp(hge->Input_GetKey()))
00256         guiSystem->injectKeyUp(hge->Input_GetKey());
00257 
00258     if (!hge->Input_IsMouseOver())
00259         guiSystem->injectMouseLeaves();
00260 
00261     if (hge->Input_GetKeyState(HGEK_LBUTTON) && !leftButtonDown)
00262         guiSystem->injectMouseButtonDown(LeftButton);
00263     else if (!hge->Input_GetKeyState(HGEK_LBUTTON) && leftButtonDown)
00264         guiSystem->injectMouseButtonUp(LeftButton);
00265 
00266     if (hge->Input_GetKeyState(HGEK_RBUTTON) && !rightButtonDown)
00267         guiSystem->injectMouseButtonDown(RightButton);
00268     else if (!hge->Input_GetKeyState(HGEK_RBUTTON) && rightButtonDown)
00269         guiSystem->injectMouseButtonUp(RightButton);
00270 
00271     if (hge->Input_GetKeyState(HGEK_LBUTTON))
00272         leftButtonDown = true;
00273     else
00274         leftButtonDown = false;
00275 
00276     if (hge->Input_GetKeyState(HGEK_RBUTTON))
00277         rightButtonDown = true;
00278     else
00279         rightButtonDown = false;
00280 
00281     float x, y;
00282     x = y = 0;
00283     hge->Input_GetMousePos(&x, &y);
00284     guiSystem->injectMousePosition(x, y);
00285 
00286     guiSystem->injectTimePulse(hge->Timer_GetDelta());
00287 }

00294 GuiManager* GuiManager::get()
00295 {
00296     if (manager == NULL)
00297         manager = new GuiManager();
00298 
00299     return manager;
